about.intro: I turn ambiguous problems into simple, lovable products.
about.details: B.Tech from JIIT Noida, followed by a career pivot through IIM Indore’s Business Analytics program. Since then I’ve worked as a Business Analyst across Healthcare and L&D—owning discovery, requirements, wireframes, UAT, and go-live readiness. I partner with clinicians, L&D leads, and engineers to map processes, write crisp BRDs/PRDs, run UAT, and measure outcomes—faster onboarding, cleaner data capture, and fewer handoffs.
strengths: Domain empathy in Healthcare & L&D — compliance, privacy, and learner outcomes.
Data-first decisions — translating analysis into clear product choices.
Documentation & communication — BRDs, PRDs, user stories, and release notes.
Cross-functional facilitation — workshops, UAT, and change management.
